summary: This is an email chain from August 1, 2019, forwarding a document related to Jeffrey Epstein. The forwarded message indicates an attachment containing compiled information about Epstein was submitted to a U.S. Attorney's Office for confidential referral to an appropriate agency.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the compiled information being forwarded. The email chain is about an attachment concerning him.

events.title: Submission of Epstein Information
events.description: An individual compiled and submitted information about Jeffrey Epstein to a U.S. Attorney's Office for confidential referral to an appropriate agency.

keyFacts: On July 31, 2019, compiled information about Jeffrey Epstein was submitted to a U.S. Attorney's Office.
The submission was made in confidence for referral to an appropriate agency.
The document is an email chain from August 1, 2019, forwarding this information, indicating ongoing official interest in Epstein around the time of his arrest.
